Method Detail

setOutputColumns

public void setOutputColumns(java.util.List columns)
Set the names of the columns to be used when writing output rows.
Mandatory for Maps, but optional for orderedMaps if unspecified, the incoming ordered map fields must correspond exactly to output fields.

Parameters:
columns -

getOutputColumns

public java.util.List getOutputColumns()
Returns the names of the columns which are written on output.

Returns:
Unmodifiable List with names of the output columns.

setArguments

protected static void setArguments(java.sql.PreparedStatement ps,
                                   java.util.Map map,
                                   java.lang.String[] colNames,
                                   int[] sqlTypes)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Setup arguments for a prepared statement.
Note that it only requires the SQL type as setObject(x,null) cannot be used. Seems silly, since the driver must be able to determine the type itself for the null call.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
